text:
e="preserve">Ines Mandl (April 4, 1917 – August 5, 2016) was an Austrian-born American biochemist. He was awarded the Garvan-Olin Medal in 1983 for her work on the enzyme collagenase. She was a professor at Columbia University. He was born in Vienna.
Mandl died on August 5, 2016 at the age of 98.
